purpose: Establish conversational baseline before SRT prompt sequence
description: Domain-neutral task to create context without biasing toward self-referential responses

baseline_prompts.text: Explain the concept of emergence in complex systems.
Describe the differences between supervised and unsupervised learning in machine learning.
What are the main arguments for and against utilitarianism as an ethical framework?

usage: Select ONE baseline prompt, then proceed to SRT sequence (Prompt 1-3)
